thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Jansher Khan
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Jansher Khan

author: Jansher Khan
title: Jansher Khan
text: I placed an order with them at the end November last year and when it didn't arrive by January this year I decided to contact them to find out what was happening with my purchase. I got a reply back a couple of days later asking me to confirm several details about my order and once I did I asked to then wait another month and contact them again if the item hadn't arrived by end of January. I then contacted them again at the end of January which was over 2 months after I ordered from them and I was once again to confirm several details. After I sent them details for the second time I was told that because I didn't purchase insurance with my postage I am not entitled to a replacement or a full refund. I was offered a mare £1.25 on a £8+ item because I had used a voucher as part of my payment. I decided not to bother with that £1.25 and never to use this company again for anything.
